languages.text: "Неумирающий шепчет о крови, и мы даруем Ему алые реки!"

traits.locale_text: "Неумирающий шепчет о крови, и мы даруем Ему алые реки!"

languages.text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий шепчет о крови, и мы даруем Ему алые реки!"

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"
"The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"
"The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"
"The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"
"The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"
"The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"

languages.text: « L'Immortel parle à voix basse de sang, et nous Lui offrons des rivières écarlates ! »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel parle à voix basse de sang, et nous Lui offrons des rivières écarlates ! »

languages.text: «El Inmortal pide sangre, ¡así que le ofrecemos ríos de color escarlata!».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal pide sangre, ¡así que le ofrecemos ríos de color escarlata!».

languages.text: 「不死の者が血を囁けば、我々はあのお方に緋色の川を捧げる！」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者が血を囁けば、我々はあのお方に緋色の川を捧げる！」

languages.text: “不死之神在低语鲜血，而我们要献给祂猩红色的血河！”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"

traits.locale_text: “不死之神在低语鲜血，而我们要献给祂猩红色的血河！”

languages.text: "Der Todlose flüstert vom Blut, und wir schenken ihm tiefrote Flüsse!"
languages.original_text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose flüstert vom Blut, und wir schenken ihm tiefrote Flüsse!"

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, fısıltılarında kandan bahsediyor. Biz de O'na kan kızılı nehirler akıtacağız!"
languages.original_text: "The Undying One whispers of blood, and we give Him scarlet rivers!"
